tool_description:
PredictHQ combines real-world events into one global source of truth to help businesses better understand demand, and plan for the future.

Our products are aimed at giving businesses greater event visibility to yield higher returns and reduce operational costs. We have created the world's largest single source of intelligent event data to make businesses and products smarter.

We also have a Data Licence for those wanting to do more with our data. This option is for those wanting to download...
name: Global Events Intelligence
title: Global Events Intelligence

api_list.name: /v1/events/

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. The default limit is 10, and maximum 200

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip. The default is 0

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of properties to sort results by. Eg title, start, end, rank, etc

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of event identifiers

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: The date from and/or to the event starts. Supports gt, gte, lt, lte and tz suffixes.  E.g. ?start.gte=2014-12-19&start.lte=2014-12-19

optional_parameters.name: rank_level
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of numbers between 1 and 5, corresponding to the PredictHQ rank levels.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of categories. school-holidays public-holidays observances concerts festivals performing-arts sports daylight-savings airport-delays severe-weather disasters

optional_parameters.name: school-holidays public-holidays observances concerts festivals performing-arts sports daylight-savings airport-delays severe-weather disasters
optional_parameters.description: A geo centre and radius in the form {radius}{unit}@{latitude},{longitude}, where the radius unit can be one of: m, km, ft, mi.  E.g. ?within=10km@-36.844480,174.768368

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of country codes.  E.g. ?country=AU,NZ

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: The date from and/or to the event ends. Supports gt, gte, lt, lte and tz suffixes.  E.g. ?end.gte=2014-12-19&end.lt=2014-12-19
